Achievements.Name: Peruvian Tomb Raider
Achievements.Description: Collect all the artifacts and relics in Peru.

Achievements.Name: Weapon Master I
Achievements.Description: Collect the Magnum weapon.

Achievements.Name: Egyptian Tomb Raider
Achievements.Description: Collect all the artifacts and relics in Egypt.

Achievements.Name: Weapon Master II
Achievements.Description: Collect the Uzi weapon.

Achievements.Name: Greek Tomb Raider
Achievements.Description: Collect all the artifacts and relics in Greece.

Achievements.Name: Weapon Master III
Achievements.Description: Collect the Shotgun weapon.

Achievements.Name: Lost Island Tomb Raider
Achievements.Description: Collect all the artifacts and relics in Lost Island.

Achievements.Name: Slayer I
Achievements.Description: Defeat the T-Rex without dying (Peru).

Achievements.Name: Slayer II
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Twin Centaur Bosses without dying (Greece).

Achievements.Name: Slayer III
Achievements.Description: Defeat the Torso Boss without dying (Lost Island).

Achievements.Name: Slayer IV
Achievements.Description: Defeat Natla without dying (Lost Island).

Achievements.Name: Easy Game
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Easy difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Medium Game
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Medium difficulty (includes Easy Game achievement).

Achievements.Name: Hard Game
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Hard difficulty (includes Easy and Medium Game achievements).

Achievements.Name: Croft Manor Speed Run
Achievements.Description: Complete the Croft Manor Time Trial.

Achievements.Name: Peruvian Speed Run
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Peru Time Trials.

Achievements.Name: Greek Speed Run
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Greece Time Trials.

Achievements.Name: Egyptian Speed Run
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Egypt Time Trials.

Achievements.Name: Lost Island Speed Run
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Lost Island Time Trials.

Achievements.Name: IRON Raider in Peru
Achievements.Description: Complete Peru without dying.

Achievements.Name: IRON Raider in Greece
Achievements.Description: Complete Greece without dying.

Achievements.Name: IRON Raider in Egypt
Achievements.Description: Complete Egypt without dying.

Achievements.Name: IRON Raider on Lost Island
Achievements.Description: Complete Lost Island without dying.

Achievements.Name: Good Show in Peru!
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Peru Super Actions without fail (first try).

Achievements.Name: Good Show in Greece!
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Greece Super Actions without fail (first try).

Achievements.Name: Good Show in Egypt!
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Egypt Super Actions without fail (first try).

Achievements.Name: Good Show on Lost Island!
Achievements.Description: Complete all the Lost Island Super Actions without fail (first try).

Achievements.Name: Croft Manor
Achievements.Description: Completed all challenges in the Croft Manor.

Achievements.Name: Gears of Doom!
Achievements.Description: Completed the Peru gear puzzle without dying.

Achievements.Name: Lightning Never Strikes Twice
Achievements.Description: Completed the Hephaestus room in Greece without being struck by lightning.

Achievements.Name: Egyptian Seals
Achievements.Description: Collected the seals of Anubis, Horus, Isis, and Osiris without dying.

Achievements.Name: Central Shaft Survivor
Achievements.Description: Completed the central shaft in the Lost Island without dying.
